description:
Gregory M. Kapfhammer is an Associate Professor of Computer Science,
researcher, educator, podcaster, and software developer. He focuses on
software engineering, software testing, database testing, flaky tests,
mutation testing, regression testing, and computer science education.
He is a co-host of Software Engineering Radio and has been recognized
with the Thoburn Award for Excellence in Teaching and multiple research
paper awards.
